achilles.name: Achilles
achilles.description: A legendary warrior whose skill in battle is unmatched. He inspires troops to fight with greater ferocity.

passive.name: Warrior's Presence
passive.description: Increases land unit attack by 5% (+1% per level) in this city.

skills.name: Warcry
skills.description: Boosts the attack of all land units by 10% (+2% per level) for the next battle.

skills.name: Rapid Mobilization
skills.description: Reduces recruitment time in the Barracks by 15% (+1% per level) for 1 hour.

odysseus.name: Odysseus
odysseus.description: A cunning strategist known for his intellect and trickery. He excels at espionage and naval tactics.

passive.name: Cunning Mind
passive.description: Increases silver production by 10% (+1.5% per level) in this city.

skills.name: Naval Superiority
skills.description: Boosts the speed of all naval units by 15% (+1% per level) for the next battle.

skills.name: Master Spy
skills.description: Increases the effectiveness of spies by 20% (+2% per level) for 2 hours.

leonidas.name: Leonidas
leonidas.description: King of Sparta, a master of defensive warfare. His presence turns his city into an unbreakable fortress.

passive.name: Spartan Resolve
passive.description: Increases the defense of Hoplites by 10% (+1.5% per level) and the city wall's effectiveness by 5% (+0.5% per level).

skills.name: Hold the Line
skills.description: Boosts the defense of all land units by 25% (+2.5% per level) for the next incoming battle.

skills.name: Phalanx Training
skills.description: Reduces recruitment time for Hoplites and Swordsmen by 20% (+2% per level) for 1 hour.

cleopatra.name: Cleopatra
cleopatra.description: The last pharaoh of Egypt, a brilliant diplomat and administrator. Her charm is as potent a weapon as any sword.

passive.name: Royal Treasury
passive.description: Increases city happiness by 5% (+0.5% per level) and silver production by 8% (+1% per level).

skills.name: Siren's Call
skills.description: Charms 5% (+0.5% per level) of incoming land units, causing them to desert before the battle begins.

skills.name: Gift of the Nile
skills.description: Instantly grants 500 (+50 per level) of each resource (wood, stone, silver).
